data.Sentence_cn: 据说弗林利这个小村里有一棵“该诅咒的树”。
data.Sentence: The tiny village of Frinley is said to possess a 'cursed tree'.

data.Sentence_cn: 就因为报上提到过这棵树，所以现在来弗林利参观的人越来越多。
data.Sentence: Because the tree was mentioned in a newspaper, the number of visitors to Frinley has now increased.

data.Sentence_cn: 该树是50年前栽在教堂附近的，
data.Sentence: The tree was planted near the church fifty years ago,

data.Sentence_cn: 但只是近几年才得到了一个坏名声。
data.Sentence: but it is only in recent years that it has gained an evil reputation.

data.Sentence_cn: 据说，谁要是触摸了这棵树，谁就会交上恶运；
data.Sentence: It is said that if anyone touches the tree, he will have bad luck;

data.Sentence_cn: 如果谁摘了一片树叶，谁就会死去。
data.Sentence: if he picks a leaf, he will die.

data.Sentence_cn: 很多村民相信此树已经害了不少人。
data.Sentence: Many villagers believe that the tree has already claimed a number of victims.

data.Sentence_cn: 人们曾请求教区的牧师叫人把树砍掉，但他直到现在也没有同意。
data.Sentence: The vicar has been asked to have the tree cut down, but so far he has refused.

data.Sentence_cn: 他指出，由于人们从全国各地纷纷前来参观这棵树，它成了一个有用的财源。
data.Sentence: He has pointed out that the tree is a useful source of income,as tourists have been coming from all parts of the country to see it.

data.Sentence_cn: 尽管有上述种种说法，但游客们还是照常摘树叶和把他们的名字刻在树干上。
data.Sentence: In spite of all that has been said, the tourists have been picking leaves and cutting their names on the tree-trunk.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而到目前为止，还没有一个人暴死呢！
data.Sentence: So far, not one of them has been struck down by sudden death!
